entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: hard graft
Type: Gift Card
Price: 50.00 - 200.00 (5 variants)

There are two good reasons to go ahead and buy this gift voucher:
A. Continuous Love: Your "giftee" is already a hard graft addict and you are not quite sure which
of the goods from the range the lucky one has been drooling over lately.

B. New Love: You are the proud gift giver introducing the lucky one to the hard graft goods.
Thinking of handing over the voucher makes your hands tingle with excitement. You
know it will rock your friends' world.

Gift card balance can be spread the over multiple visits

After purchase an email containing a unique code will be sent to you

Valid on www.hardgraft.com only

Redeemable within one year

entry.title: iPad Air Tilt Case & Stand / Smoke
entry.summary:
Vendor: hard graft
Type: Leather
Price: 95.00

POLE POSITION
The iPad Air Tilt Case & Stand is a hard graft classic brought bang up to date. We released the first ever Tilt case just a few weeks after the original iPad came out back in 2010. No wonder it’s so successful, it effortlessly sports all three positions - typing, surfing and watching. Plus it’s all about the haptic experience - sturdy wool felt outer and the touch of über premium leather inside just feels right in combination with the cool exterior of your iPad.

iPad 2 Version available here


Fits iPad Air only

Tailored fit (does not fit iPad with the Apple Smart Cover)

Wool Felt to protect from bumps and scratches

Fuss-free Design without Magnets

Internal leather cover

Secure Metal Snap Closure

Doubles as a clever stand

Handmade by Skilled Craftsmen in Italy with a touch of magic

Über Premium Vegetable Tanned Italian Leather

Pure German Wool Felt (3mm)

Soft black Italian Nappa Detailing

Signature Red and White Ribbon

More info on materials and care see Details

entry.title: Draw iPad Case & Stand / Heritage
entry.summary:
Vendor: hard graft
Type: Leather
Price: 115.00 - 125.00 (2 variants)

STAND AND DELIVER
Put your iPad in the case, pull the rope to close and fix it with the metal stopper. But that's not all, this iPad case also transforms into the perfect stand so you can use your iPad as a bedside alarm clock, for watching movies or typing. The ingenious marl grey rope closure does all the clever work.

Two sizes available to fit iPad mini or iPad Air

Tailored fit (does not fit iPad with the Apple Smart Cover)

Doubles as a clever stand

Ingenious grey cord feature

Extra secure closure with metal stopper

Fully padded with wool

Handmade by Skilled Craftsmen in Italy with a touch of magic

Über Premium Vegetable Tanned Italian Leather

Rich Italian Wool Felt Lining (1mm)

Tactile Japanese Cotton Cord

Signature Red and White Ribbon

More info on materials and care see Details

entry.title: Wool Flat Pack / Heritage
entry.summary:
Vendor: hard graft
Type: Leather
Price: 230.00 - 240.00 (3 variants)

WEIGHT WATCHER
We've designed it to be just the right size to fit your iPad or MacBook plus a few small essential extras. And because you carry your most valuable possessions with you, we've made the Flat Pack safe too. Firstly, you can carry it cross body, secondly we did something pretty clever - the zipper opening is on the inside of the bag. So the only one who can access this bag is you.

Available in three different sizes

Size for iPad, MacBook Air 11" - 30cm x 20cm x 4cm / 11.8” x 7.87” x 1.57

Size for MacBook Pro/Air 13" - 35cm x 25cm x 4cm / 13.78” x 9.84” x 1.57

Size for MacBook Pro 15"/Retina - 40cm x 27cm x 4cm / 15.75” x 10.6” x 1.57

Slim compact format

Main Compartment fits essentials such as MacBook/iPad, Charger, Wallet and small items

Secure metal zip closure for main compartment

One inside pocket in the opening (for iPhone, Wallet, Moleskine,…)

Softly padded front and sides to help protect your MacBook

Black lining, one main compartment (no divider)

Adjustable leather shoulder strap

15" version only: straps have turning secure screw hinges

Every handle, rivet and stitch is reinforced and supported from the inside

Handmade by Skilled Craftsmen in Italy with a touch of magic

Über Premium Vegetable Tanned Italian Leather

Rich Italian Wool Felt Outer(1mm)

Signature Red and White Ribbon

More info on materials and care see Details

entry.title: Sport iPad Case & Stand / Heritage
entry.summary:
Vendor: hard graft
Type: Leather
Price: 70.00 - 75.00 (2 variants)

A MATCH MADE IN HEAVEN
We are big fans of the uncovered “naked” iPad, the cold and sharp feeling of the glass and aluminium in your hand. Juxtapose this cool device with our cushioned wool and leather pouch which doubles as a savvy stand. This is all about ultimate protection and functionality that ticks all the right boxes.

Two sizes available to fit iPad mini or iPad Air

iPad mini also fits Google Nexus 7

Tailored fit (does not fit iPad with the Apple Smart Cover)

Doubles as a clever stand

Wool Felt to protect from bumps and scratches

Fully lined Leather Flap

Secure Metal Snap Closure (which does not touch the iPad)

Handmade by Skilled Craftsmen in Italy with a touch of magic

Über Premium Vegetable Tanned Italian Leather

Pure German Wool Felt (3mm)

Signature Red and White Ribbon

More info on materials and care see Details
